solution.title: Share Of Voice
solution.description: Provide market share comparison for a client and fize or more anaonymized peers.  The dashboard shows KPIs such as: platform, creative type, geographic area, and impressions over time.
instructions: You will need acess to all DCM Accounts ( probably global user profile ).
The first will be the client, the others will be anonymized as peers.
LEGAL WARNING: DO NOT DISCLOSE how many peers are in the set to the client.
LEGAL WARNING: DO NOT DISCLOSE who the peers are to the client.
Wait for BigQuery->StarThinker Data->{{DATASET}}->Share_Of_Voice to be created or click Run Now.
Copy Share Of Voice Sample Data ( Copy From This ).
Copy Share Of Voice Sample Report ( Copy From This ).
When prompted choose the new data source you just created.
Or give the dashboard connect intructions to the client.
